Detailed Description

This is the SHA-256 class (output hash size is 256 bits). 



 // The following code, show how to hash a file

 wxSHA256Hash hash;
 wxSHA256 sha256;

 wxFileInputStream fis(wxT("name.ext"));

 sha256.Hash(fis, hash);

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxSHA256::wxSHA256 (  )  [inline]

This is the default constructor.

It does nothing itself, it only extend the wxSHABase512 constructor.

See also:
wxSHABase512(const wxSHAType &Wsize)

Member Function Documentation

bool wxSHA256::Hash ( const void *  input,
const size_t &  input_size,
wxSHA256Hash &  hash 
)

Perform the hash calculation over a binary buffer.

It initialize a memory input stream and passes it to the generic hash calculation function.

Parameters:
input a binary buffer pointer.
input_size the binary buffer data length.
hash a wxSHA256Hash valid class; the resulting hash value is stored here.
Returns:
True on success, false if an error occurred.
See also:
Hash(wxInputStream &input, wxSHA256Hash &hash)

bool wxSHA256::Hash ( wxInputStream &  input,
wxSHA256Hash &  hash 
)

Perform the hash calculation over a generic input stream.

The input stream length must be determinable.

Parameters:

Returns:
True on success, false if an error occurred.
